hint.en: This card is triggered when the Surveillance Mode is changed, the new Mode is available in the Surveillance Mode tag.

hint.en: This card is triggered when there is a sensor in active state when the Surveillance Mode is set to Armed or Partially Armed.

hint.en: This card is triggered when there is a sensor in active state when a Sensor Check is run.
This card is triggered when the Alarm State is activated. The Zone and Reason are available in the tags.
This card is triggered when the Alarm State is deactivated. The way the Alarm State is deactivated is available in the Source tag.

title.es: El retardo de la alarma est√° activado.

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Alarm Delay is activated. The length of the delay, Zone and Reason are available in the tags.

title.es: El retardo de armado est√° activado.

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Arming Delay is activated. The length of the delay is available in the Duration tag.

title.fr: Le temps jusqu'√† ce que l'alarme a chang√©
title.es: El tiempo hasta que la alarma cambi√≥

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Alarm Counter changes. The seconds left are available in the Seconds until alarm tag.

title.es: El tiempo hasta que cambi√≥ el armado

hint.en: This card is triggered when the Arming Counter changes. The seconds left are available in the Seconds until armed tag.

title.no: En linje ble skrevet i loggen

hint.en: This card is triggered when a line is written to the log for a device that has logging enabled. The Zone, Device and State are available in the tags.

title.es: Sensor disparado en estado de alarma

hint.en: This card is triggered when a sensor is tripped while the Alarm State is active. The Zone, Device and State are available in the tags.

This card is triggered when a device has not communicated with Homey for 24 Hours. All devices are checked when changing the Surveillance Mode or using the Check Last Communication Flow card. The Duration, Last communicationtime, Zone and Device are available in the tags.
Evaluates if the Surveillance Mode is a certain value.

Evaluates if an Alarm Countdown is (not) active.

Checks if devices that are included in a Surveillance Mode have communcicated with Homey in the last 24 hours. Make a flow with the triggercard No information received to process the results.
